Instead of ignoring or quickly resolving inconsistencies, Contradiction mapping highlights these foundational drivers, letting you identify which value or goal is operating beneath the surfacEach contradiction becomes a starting point for recursive questioning: “How can both be true; under what conditions does each make seThese recursive loops dig “beneath the surface,” surfacing hidden mental models, systemic constraints, or cognitive shortcuts at playRegularly finding contradiction “hotspots” in your reasoning uncovers areas where your thinking is on autopilot or based on default a"I want maximum freedom, vs I also need structure
C"Feedback is crucial, vs I avoid criticism
